title: SIXMJ
author: SIXMJ
content: any interests? Pm me your offer i'm going to contact minerjones for an auction with pics.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Use imgur.com or imgbb.com to upload image and post the link here so that potential buyers can see the picture and save time to PM you and ask for it 1 by 1. We can quote your post so that image will be visible to on this thread without the need of copper membership.Good luck with the sales.
